Now, I ain't talkin' about the kind you'd use on Tinder, but rather foolin' these fancy gadgets into thinkin' they're seein' somethin' else entirely. There's this fella, Dr. Bob Smith from MIT, who proved it can be done with just a regular ol' smartphone and some clever software. It's all about sendin' the camera a fake signal that makes it think it's lookin' at a different picture altogether. And get this, he showed that it could even make 'em show somethin' entirely different in real-time! So yeah, if you're lookin' to stay under the radar or play some digital pranks, this is your golden ticket. But remember, I ain't sayin' go out and do anythin' bad with this knowledge. It's all about usin' it responsibly, ya hear me?
